resources.string:
Welcome to Babble Word Game!

How to Play

 1. You will see a word in english on the screen.
 2. While this word is displayed, a word in Spanish will fall down on the screen.
 3. You will have to choose if the falling word is the correct translation or a wrong translation.
 4. You need to answer, before the word reaches the bottom of the screen.
 5. Guess as many coorect meanings as possible to get a High Score
